mapper.select: select b.`name` as province_name, c.`name` as city_name, d.`name` as area_name, e.city_marketing_id, ifnull(f.clerk_commission,'0') as clerk_commission, f.cm_six_id, ifnull(f.service_provider_commission,'0') as service_provider_commission from tb_city_file a left join tb_pcd b on a.province_id=b.pcd_id left join tb_pcd c on a.city_id=c.pcd_id left join tb_pcd d on a.area_id=d.pcd_id left join tb_city_marketing e on a.city_file_id=e.city_file_id left join tb_cm_six f on e.city_marketing_id=f.city_marketing_id where b.name=#{province_name} and c.name=#{city_name} and d.name=#{area_name} limit 1

select b.`name` as province_name, c.`name` as city_name, d.`name` as area_name, e.onexing_money, e.twoxing_money, e.threexing_money from tb_city_file a left join tb_pcd b on a.province_id=b.pcd_id left join tb_pcd c on a.city_id=c.pcd_id left join tb_pcd d on a.area_id=d.pcd_id left join tb_city_file_sort e on a.city_file_id=e.city_file_id where e.city_file_sort_id=#{city_sort_one} and b.name=#{province_name} and c.name=#{city_name} and d.name=#{area_name}

select a.province_name, a.city_name, a.area_name, a.address, a.store_file_id, a.store_id, a.store_name, b.goods_max, b.registertel_phone, (select count(*) from tb_goods c where c.store_id=a.store_id ) as goodsnumber, (select count(*),d.store_id from tb_store_wealthhistory d where d.store_id=a.store_id and d.profit_type='18' and day(d.createtime) = day(now())) as wealthnumber from tb_store_file a join tb_store b on a.store_id=b.store_id where a.province_name=#{province_name} and a.city_name=#{city_name} and a.area_name=#{area_name}

select a.store_name, a.pictrue_url, a.password, a.check_status, a.store_vip_id, a.merchant_status, a.merchant_level, a.integral_rate, a.service_rate, a.withdraw_rate, a.lowest_score, a.remind_integral, a.sort_score, a.complex_score, cast(cast(a.complex_score as signed) as char) star, cast(cast(a.comment_score as signed) as char) comment_star, a.recharge_times, a.transaction_times, a.withdraw_times, a.zan_times, a.collection_times, a.bigtype_max, a.smalltype_max, a.goods_max, a.registertel_phone, a.store_file_id, a.longitude, a.latitude , a.store_id, ifnull(b.store_introduce,'') store_introduce, b.address, b.phone_bymemeber, b.principal, b.phone, b.province_name, b.city_name, b.area_name from tb_store a left join tb_store_file b on a.store_id=b.store_id left join tb_city_file_sort c on b.city_sort_one=c.city_file_sort_id left join tb_city_file_sort d on b.city_sort_two=d.city_file_sort_id left join tb_city_file_sort e on b.city_sort_three=e.city_file_sort_id where 1=1 and a.check_status='1' and a.merchant_status != '4' and b.open_status='1' and b.biaozhun_status='1'
and (c.sort_parent_id=#{city_file_sort_id} or d.sort_parent_id=#{city_file_sort_id} or e.sort_parent_id=#{city_file_sort_id})
order by a.complex_score desc
